### ggplot2 

```{r, message=FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(diamonds, aes(carat, price)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~cut)
```
